# openMaps(with:launchOptions:from:completionHandler:)

**Type Method**

Opens the Maps app from a particular scene using the specified map items and options.

## Declaration

```swift
class func openMaps(with mapItems: [MKMapItem], launchOptions: [String : Any]? = nil, from scene: UIScene?, completionHandler completion: ((Bool) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
class func openMaps(with mapItems: [MKMapItem], launchOptions: [String : Any]? = nil, from scene: UIScene?) async -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **mapItems**: An array of map items to open in the Maps app.
- **launchOptions**: A dictionary of launch options to pass to the Maps app.
- **scene**: The scene where the user interaction takes place.
- **completion**: A completion block the system calls that indicates whether the request was successful.

## Launching the Maps app

- **openMaps(with:launchOptions:)**: Opens the Maps app and displays the specified map items.
- **openMaps(with:launchOptions:completionHandler:)**: Opens the Maps app using the specified map items and options.
- **openInMaps(launchOptions:)**: Opens the Maps app and displays the map item.
- **openInMaps(launchOptions:completionHandler:)**: Opens the Maps app and displays the map item.
- **openInMaps(launchOptions:from:completionHandler:)**: Opens the Maps app from a particular scene using the specified options.
